867910.name: Fantasy Grounds - Frequent Foes, Volume 3 (Token Pack)
867910.description:
Frequent Foes, Volume 03

Swell your ranks with Monster Grin's Frequent Foes token packs! These packs provide tokens for all of the "usual suspects" that one expects to encounter while gaming: goblins, orcs, dark elves, ogres, and more. In this pack, canny DMs/GMs will find 132 amazingly crafted tokens from our partners Altema Games that depict spooky Shamans, fierce Orcs, kooky Kobolds and much more!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really take your game to the stars!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Heyna
  • Kobold
  • Minotaur
  • Ogre
  • Orc
  • Shaman
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
